original_text:
“Now a word was brought to me stealthily;
    my ear received the whisper of it.
korean_text: 어떤 말씀이 내게 가만히 이르고 그 가느다란 소리가 내 귀에 들렸었나니

sentences.original_text: “Now a word was brought to me stealthily
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 한 말씀이 은밀히 내게 전해졌다

sentences.original_text: my ear received the whisper of it.
